creator: Green Horse Games
descriptionHtml:
Join this multiplayer football world, team up with your friends and create the PERFECT FOOTBALL TEAM!

Start your football career, deal cards to attack your rivals or help your friends, join your favorite Team and win Trophies with your friends and teammates!

*Deal, attack, defend and help!*
Deal cards and gain valuable skill, attack your rivals by shooting penalties and looting their skill! Collect gloves to defend against rival attacks, and help your friends and teammates by sending them gifts!

*Train your way to the top!*
Build your career by upgrading your level and gain Stars to unlock features and JOIN A TEAM!

*Real challenge with friends!*
Join your favorite football Team or later create your own! Recruit your friends and play against teams with other real players all around the world! Score goals for your Team and become its HERO!

*Shine bright like a Trophy!*
Play in multiple competitions like the Championship, National Cup, Champions League and collect trophies for your Team with your friends! Victory is yours for the taking!

*An online football world in your hands!*
Join the Football Rivals online community on Facebook, and stay updated with contests, new features, releases and news!
Download the app and join millions of football players across the world in our unique social multiplayer football game!

Football Rivals is free to play, but some items can be purchased for real money.
A network connection is required to play!

For any issues or suggestions regarding the game, simply contact us at: support.footballrivals@greenhorsegames.com
descriptionShort: Play with friends and help your team score!

title: Football Rivals - Team Up with your Friends!

container.value: Strada Gladitei, nr 42,  Bloc T6, parter, sector 4, Bucuresti, Cod postal: 041211

creator: Green Horse Games
descriptionHtml:
Football Rivals is a football game about team spirit! Win Trophies with your friends, gain points, and help your football team to climb up the Rankings.

Imagine a world where football fans build and grow great teams together.

Start your football career for free, deal cards to gain energy, possession, attack your rivals or help your friends. Join your favorite Team and win Trophies with your friends and teammates!

Deal, attack, defend and help!
Deal cards and gain valuable skill, attack your rivals by shooting penalties and looting their skill! Collect gloves to defend against rival attacks, and help your friends and teammates by sending them gifts!

Train your way to the top!
Build your career by upgrading your level, gain Stars to unlock features and JOIN A TEAM!

A world where you can collaborate and be in the same team with your friends and play against other players from all over the world.

LIVE football matches
Join the game during the live matches session to gain more skills, feel the emotion and see real time scores.
Real challenge with friends!
Join your favorite football Team or later create your own! Recruit your friends and play against teams with other real players all around the world! Score goals for your Team and become its HERO!

A world where you can become the star and win great trophies: the League Trophy, the National Cup Trophy, The Champions Cup, the Continental Cup, etc.

Shine bright like a Trophy!
Play matches in multiple competitions like the Championship, National Cup, Champions League and the latest competition added: Continental Cup. Bring your contribution to the victory! Collect trophies for your Team with your friends! Victory is yours for the taking!

An online football world in your hands!
Join the Football Rivals online community on Facebook, and stay updated with contests, new features, releases and news!
Download the app and join millions of football players across the world in our unique social multiplayer football game!

Team Chat
Speak directly with your team in the internal chat. Prepare strategies and read announcements from your Capitan.

Football Rivals is free to play, but some items can be purchased for real money.

A network connection is required to play!



Join the football game world! Join Football Rivals!

For any issues or suggestions regarding the game, simply contact us at: support.footballrivals@greenhorsegames.com
descriptionShort: Play with friends and help your team score!

title: Football Rivals - Team Up with your Friends!

container.value: Strada Gladitei, nr 42,  Bloc T6, parter, sector 4, Bucuresti, Cod postal: 041211

creator: Green Horse Games
descriptionHtml:
This is your chance to prove you’re the BEST!

Join this online soccer world! Team up with your friends and win matches TOGETHER!

Start your soccer career, deal cards to attack your rivals or help your friends, join your favorite Team and win Trophies with your friends and teammates!

Face off against real players from all around the world

Deal cards and gain valuable skill, attack your rivals by shooting penalties and looting their skill! Collect gloves to defend against rival attacks, and help your friends and teammates by sending them gifts!

Train your way to the top!
Build your career by upgrading your level and make an amazing soccer team with your friends!

The madness that can happen in derbies is here!
Join your favorite soccer Team or later create your own!
Recruit your friends and play against teams with other real players all around the world! Score goals for your Team and become its HERO!

Shine bright like a Trophy!
Play in multiple competitions like the Championship, National Cup, Champions League and collect trophies for your Team with your friends! Victory is yours for the taking!

An online soccer world in your hands!

Join the Football Rivals online community on Facebook, and stay updated with contests, new features, releases and news!

Download the app and join millions of soccer players across the world in this very social sport game!

Football Rivals is free to play, but some items can be purchased for real money.
A network connection is required to play!

For any issues or suggestions regarding the game, simply contact us at: support.footballrivals@greenhorsegames.com

title: Football Rivals - Team Up with your Friends!

container.value: Aleea Fizicienilor Nr. 21, Bl. 1F, Scara 2, Et. 4, Ap.27  - Bucuresti, Cod postal: 041211

creator: Green Horse Games
descriptionHtml:
Join this online football world! Team up with your friends and win matches TOGETHER!

Start your football career, deal cards to attack your rivals or help your friends, join your favorite Team and win Trophies with your friends and teammates!

*Deal, attack, defend and help!*
Deal cards and gain valuable skill, attack your rivals by shooting penalties and looting their skill! Collect gloves to defend against rival attacks, and help your friends and teammates by sending them gifts!

*Train your way to the top!*
Build your career by upgrading your level and make an amazing football team with your friends!

*Real challenge with friends!*
Join your favorite football Team or later create your own! Recruit your friends and play against teams with other real players all around the world! Score goals for your Team and become its HERO!

*Shine bright like a Trophy!*
Play in multiple competitions like the Championship, National Cup, Champions League and collect trophies for your Team with your friends! Victory is yours for the taking!

*An online football world in your hands!*
Join the Football Rivals online community on Facebook, and stay updated with contests, new features, releases and news!

Download the app and join millions of football players across the world in this very social football game!

Football Rivals is free to play, but some items can be purchased for real money.
A network connection is required to play!

For any issues or suggestions regarding the game, simply contact us at: support.footballrivals@greenhorsegames.com
descriptionShort: Play with friends and help your team score! Show what teamwork is all about!

container.value: Aleea Fizicienilor Nr. 21, Bl. 1F, Scara 2, Et. 4, Ap.27  - Bucuresti, Cod postal: 041211

creator: Green Horse Games
descriptionHtml:
Join this multiplayer football world, team up with your friends, score goals, and create the PERFECT FOOTBALL TEAM!⚽

Start your football career
Deal cards to attack your rivals or help your friends. In this soccer game, you can join your favorite team, win trophies 🏆 with your friends and teammates! This is the sports game for real champions. 🏅

Train your way to the top!
Build your football career by upgrading your level and gain new skills.Level up to increase your strength and JOIN A SOCCER TEAM! Don't forget that training is what your player needs! Score goals and join the team of the soccer stars. ✨ Sports games are a fun way to spend time with friends.

Join the community
Join and stand beside people from your country and support your national soccer teams! Come and play with people who love football games as you do. Score, win every match and be the best football player. Team up with friends in this multiplayer football game to win your league.🔥 Help your national soccer team and support your country!

Deal, attack, defend and help!
If you like football games ⚽ - Football Rivals is just for you. Try it out and join others on your way to become a football champion. 🏅 Deal cards and gain valuable skill, attack your rivals by shooting penalties and looting their skill! Collect gloves to defend against rival attacks, and help your friends and teammates by sending them gifts!

Real challenge with friends!
Join your favorite soccer team or later create your own! Recruit your friends and play against teams with other real players all around the world! Score goals for your team and become its HERO! Join your friends who like football games.

Multiplayer football game you have to try out!

Shine bright like a Trophy!
Play in multiple competitions like the Championship, National Cup, Champions Cup and collect trophies for your Team with your friends! 🏆 Victory is yours for the taking! Become champions with your friends and advance your football career.

An online soccer world in your hands!

title: Football Rivals - Multiplayer Soccer Game

container.value: Aleea Fizicienilor Nr. 21, Bl. 1F, Scara 2, Et. 4, Ap.27  - Bucuresti, Cod postal: 041211

creator: Green Horse Games
descriptionHtml:
Do you want to experience something different from the usual football games you play? ⚽ Football Rivals is just for you.

This is a multiplayer football game that brings football fans together. Team up with your friends and lead your team to success!

🏅 Start your football career 🏅
Millions of players from all over the globe are waiting for you in this soccer game, where you can meet new friends and join a supportive community. Here, teamwork makes the difference!

Deal football cards to attack your rivals and make history with your friends help!! Participate in exciting matches where you will have to prove your team spirit and tactical skills. A football game you shouldn't miss out on!

👥 Join your local football community 👥
Find and team up with people from your country to support your national soccer team! Lots of friends that love soccer games just like you do are waiting for you. Who knows, maybe those friendships that you will start in Football Rivals can transform into real ones, and you will have new mates to go to real soccer games with!

Main Features
• Join a Team: collaborate, make strategies and play matches with other real people;
• Finish the Academies to gain skills;
• Team customization - logo, avatars, description, statuses;
• Team Chat: where you can talk to your teammates and prepare the strategies for the upcoming competitions;
• Matches - participate with your team in simplified football matches against other teams;
• Use emojis to communicate your thoughts to your opponents;
• Energy to play a slot machine - attack opponents in a penalty shootout mini-game, help your teammates & friends with gifts, level up and become the hero of your team
• Football game competitions - participate in competitions like: Champions Cup, Continental Cup, National Cup, Super Cup, World Nations Cup;
• In World Nations Cup, your team can take over different National Teams and bring them to glory in the qualifying, groups and knockout stages;
• Training Sessions: a 50 players competition where the biggest goal is to increase your level faster;
• Thematic Golden Ball Competitions - with the possibility of unlocking unique items that will help you on each match.

🏆 Deal football cards, play matches, win and become a champion. 🏆
In this multiplayer football game, players from all over the world can connect, build friendships, create the best teams and fight together for the same goals. Football Rivals is your daily escape from real life where you can be part of your dream football team.

✨ Multiplayer football game you have to try out! ✨
Your goal is to win trophies and fight for a better place in the National and World Rankings. The adrenaline increases during the LIVE matches played against other Real Players, this is why being ACTIVE, especially during the live match, is an essential part. To win, besides Energy, you’ll also need your teammates. You need to be there for them, no matter what! To draw the winning football cards and become champions together. One thing is for sure - Teamwork helps you SCORE in Football Rivals!

🌎 An online football world in your hands! 🌎
You can connect your social media account to find your friends easily and make new ones! Join the Football Rivals online soccer community on Facebook and Instagram, and stay updated with contests, new features, releases, and news!

Football Rivals is free to play, but some items can be purchased for real money.
A network connection is required to play!

For any issues or suggestions regarding the game, contact us at: support.footballrivals@greenhorsegames.com
descriptionShort: Team up with friends & build your team! Beat your rivals & be a football star!

title: Football Rivals - Multiplayer Soccer Game

container.value: Aleea Fizicienilor Nr. 21, Bl. 1F, Scara 2, Et. 4, Ap.27  - Bucuresti, Cod postal: 041211

creator: Green Horse Games
descriptionHtml:
Do you want to experience something different from the usual soccer games you play? ⚽ Football Rivals is just for you.

A multiplayer soccer game that brings sports fans together. Team up with your friends and lead your team to success! Help it to become the ultimate team!

🏅 Start your soccer career 🏅
Millions of players from all over the globe are waiting for you in this social soccer game, where you can meet new friends and join a supportive community. Here, teamwork makes the difference!

Deal soccer cards to attack your ultimate rivals! Participate in exciting matches where you will have to prove your team spirit and tactical skills. A soccer game you shouldn't miss out on! Match by match you can improve your strategy to bring fame by your side.

👥 Join your local soccer community 👥
Find and team up with people from your country to support your national soccer team and defeat rival countries!
Lots of friends that love soccer games just like you do are waiting for you. Who knows, maybe those friendships that you will start in Football Rivals can transform into real ones, and you will have new mates to go to real soccer games with!

Main Features
• Join a Team: collaborate, make strategies and play matches with other real people - each match will be a real challenge;
• Team customization - logo, avatars, description, statuses;
• Team Chat: where you can talk to your teammates and prepare the strategies for the upcoming competitions tournaments;
• Matches - participate in each soccer match with your team and score as many goals as you can;
• Use emojis to communicate your thoughts to your rivals;
• Energy to play a slot machine - attack rivals in a penalty shootout mini-game, help your teammates & friends with gifts, level up, and become the hero of your team;
• Soccer game competitions - participate in competitions like Champions Cup, American League, Continental Cup, National Cup, Super Cup, and World Nations Cup
• In World Nations Cup, your Club can take over different National Teams and bring them to glory in the qualifying, groups, and knockout stages;
• Training Sessions: a 50 players competition where the biggest goal is to increase your level faster;
• Thematic Golden Ball Competitions - with the possibility of unlocking unique items that will help you on each match: special ball, stronger defense, customized football cards, and more possession to defeat your opponents.

🏆 Deal soccer cards, play soccer games, win and become a champion. 🏆
In this virtual soccer world, players from all over the world can connect, build friendships, create the best teams and fight together for the same goals. Football Rivals is your daily escape from real life where you can be part of your dream soccer team and fight in your dream league.

✨ Step on the field and try out this multiplayer soccer game! ✨
Your goal is to win trophies and fight for a better place in the National and World Rankings. The adrenaline increases during the LIVE matches played against other Real Players, this is why being ACTIVE, especially during the live match, is an essential part. To win, besides Energy, you’ll also need your teammates. You need to be there for them, no matter what! To draw the winning soccer cards and become champions together by winning your dream league and lots of other tournaments.
One thing is for sure - Teamwork helps you SCORE in Football Rivals!

🌎 An online soccer world in your hands! 🌎
You can connect your social media account to find your friends easily and make new ones! Join the Football Rivals online soccer community on Facebook, Instagram, and TikTok and stay updated with contests, new features, releases, and news!

Football Rivals is free to play, but some items can be purchased for real money.
A network connection is required to play!

For any issues or suggestions regarding the game, contact us at: support.footballrivals@greenhorsegames.com

• Soccer game competitions - participate in competitions like Champions Cup, American League, Continental Cup, National Cup, Super Cup, and World Nations Cup
• In World Nations Cup, your Club can take over different National Teams and bring them to glory in the qualifying, groups, and knockout stages;
• Training Sessions: a 50 players competition where the biggest goal is to increase your level faster;
• Thematic Golden Ball Competitions - with the possibility of unlocking unique items that will help you on each match: special ball, stronger defense, customized football cards, and more possession to defeat your opponents.

🏆 Deal soccer cards, play soccer games, win and become a champion. 🏆
In this virtual soccer world, players from all over the world can connect, build friendships, create the best teams and fight together for the same goals. Football Rivals is your daily escape from real life where you can be part of your dream soccer team and fight in your dream league.

✨ Step on the field and try out this multiplayer soccer game! ✨
Your goal is to win trophies and fight for a better place in the National and World Rankings. The adrenaline increases during the LIVE matches played against other Real Players, this is why being ACTIVE, especially during the live match, is an essential part. To win, besides Energy, you’ll also need your teammates. You need to be there for them, no matter what! To draw the winning soccer cards and become champions together by winning your dream league and lots of other tournaments.
One thing is for sure - Teamwork helps you SCORE in Football Rivals!

🌎 An online soccer world in your hands! 🌎
You can connect your social media account to find your friends easily and make new ones! Join the Football Rivals online soccer community on Facebook, Instagram, and TikTok and stay updated with contests, new features, releases, and news!

Football Rivals is free to play, but some items can be purchased for real money.
A network connection is required to play!

For any issues or suggestions regarding the game, contact us at: support.footballrivals@greenhorsegames.com

descriptionHtml:
Join this multiplayer football world, team up with your friends, score goals and create the PERFECT FOOTBALL TEAM!⚽

Start your football career
Deal cards to attack your rivals or help your friends. In this soccer game, you can join your favorite team, win trophies 🏆 with your friends and teammates! This is the sports game for real champions. 🏅

Train your way to the top!
Build your football career by upgrading your level and gain new skills.Level up to increase your strength and JOIN A SOCCER TEAM! Don't forget that training is what your player needs! Score goals and join the team of the soccer stars. ✨ Sports games are a fun way to spend time with friends.

Join the community
Join and stand beside people from your country and support your national soccer teams! Come and play with people who love football games as you do. Score, win every match and be the best football player. Team up with friends in this multiplayer football game to win your league.🔥 Help your national soccer team and support your country!

Deal, attack, defend and help!
If you like football games ⚽ - Football Rivals is just for you. Try it out and join others on your way to become a football champion. 🏅 Deal cards and gain valuable skill, attack your rivals by shooting penalties and looting their skill! Collect gloves to defend against rival attacks, and help your friends and teammates by sending them gifts!

Real challenge with friends!
Join your favorite soccer team or later create your own! Recruit your friends and play against teams with other real players all around the world! Score goals for your team and become its HERO! Join your friends who like football games.

Multiplayer football game you have to try out!

Shine bright like a Trophy!
Play in multiple competitions like the Championship, National Cup, Champions Cup and collect trophies for your Team with your friends! 🏆 Victory is yours for the taking! Become champions with your friends and advance your football career.

An online soccer world in your hands!
Join the Football Rivals online community on Facebook, and stay updated with contests, new features, releases and news! Find new tricks to be a better soccer player. ⚽

Download the app and join millions of soccer players across the world in our unique social multiplayer football game!
Don't stop winning, score goals and you will be part of the soccer stars club.

COME AND PLAY football game
- Team up with friends in this multiplayer game.
- Score goals and join the team of the soccer stars.
- If you like sports games, join us now.
- Be the best football player and make your soccer team champions.
- Start your football career now.

creator: Green Horse Games
descriptionHtml:
Join this multiplayer football world, team up with your friends, score goals and create the PERFECT FOOTBALL TEAM!⚽

Start your football career
Deal cards to attack your rivals or help your friends. In this soccer game, you can join your favorite team, win trophies 🏆 with your friends and teammates! This is the sports game for real champions. 🏅

Train your way to the top!
Build your football career by upgrading your level and gain new skills.Level up to increase your strength and JOIN A SOCCER TEAM! Don't forget that training is what your player needs! Score goals and join the team of the soccer stars. ✨ Sports games are a fun way to spend time with friends.

Join the community
Join and stand beside people from your country and support your national soccer teams! Come and play with people who love football games as you do. Score, win every match and be the best football player. Team up with friends in this multiplayer football game to win your league.🔥 Help your national soccer team and support your country!

Deal, attack, defend and help!
If you like football games ⚽ - Football Rivals is just for you. Try it out and join others on your way to become a football champion. 🏅 Deal cards and gain valuable skill, attack your rivals by shooting penalties and looting their skill! Collect gloves to defend against rival attacks, and help your friends and teammates by sending them gifts!

Real challenge with friends!
Join your favorite soccer team or later create your own! Recruit your friends and play against teams with other real players all around the world! Score goals for your team and become its HERO! Join your friends who like football games.

Multiplayer football game you have to try out!

Shine bright like a Trophy!
Play in multiple competitions like the Championship, National Cup, Champions Cup and collect trophies for your Team with your friends! 🏆 Victory is yours for the taking! Become champions with your friends and advance your football career.

An online soccer world in your hands!
Join the Football Rivals online community on Facebook, and stay updated with contests, new features, releases and news! Find new tricks to be a better soccer player. ⚽

Download the app and join millions of soccer players across the world in our unique social multiplayer football game!
Don't stop winning, score goals and you will be part of the soccer stars club.

COME AND PLAY football game
- Team up with friends in this multiplayer game.
- Score goals and join the team of the soccer stars.
- If you like sports games, join us now.
- Be the best football player and make your soccer team champions.
- Start your football career now.

Football Rivals is free to play football game, but some items can be purchased for real money.
A network connection is required to play!

For any issues or suggestions regarding the game, simply contact us at: support.footballrivals@greenhorsegames.com

title: Football Rivals: Online Soccer

container.value: Aleea Fizicienilor Nr. 21, Bl. 1F, Scara 2, Et. 4, Ap.27  - Bucuresti, Cod postal: 041211

creator: Green Horse Games
descriptionHtml:
Do you want to experience something different from the usual soccer games you play? ⚽ Football Rivals is just for you.

A multiplayer soccer game that brings sports fans together. Team up with your friends and lead your team to success! Help it to become the ultimate team!

🏅 Start your soccer career 🏅
Millions of players from all over the globe are waiting for you in this social soccer game, where you can meet new friends and join a supportive community. Here, teamwork makes the difference!

Deal soccer cards to attack your ultimate rivals! Participate in exciting matches where you will have to prove your team spirit and tactical skills. A soccer game you shouldn't miss out on! Match by match you can improve your strategy to bring fame by your side.

👥 Join your local soccer community 👥
Find and team up with people from your country to support your national soccer team and defeat rival countries!
Lots of friends that love soccer games just like you do are waiting for you. Who knows, maybe those friendships that you will start in Football Rivals can transform into real ones, and you will have new mates to go to real soccer games with!

Main Features
• Join a Team: collaborate, make strategies and play matches with other real people - each match will be a real challenge;
• Team customization - logo, avatars, description, statuses;
• Team Chat: where you can talk to your teammates and prepare the strategies for the upcoming competitions tournaments;
• Matches - participate in each soccer match with your team and score as many goals as you can;
• Use emojis to communicate your thoughts to your rivals;
• Energy to play - attack rivals in a penalty shootout mini-game, help your teammates & friends with gifts, level up, and become the hero of your team;
• Soccer game competitions - participate in competitions like Champions Cup, American League, Continental Cup, National Cup, Super Cup, and World Nations Cup
• In World Nations Cup, your Club can take over different National Teams and bring them to glory in the qualifying, groups, and knockout stages;
• Training Sessions: a 50 players competition where the biggest goal is to increase your level faster;
• Thematic Golden Ball Competitions - with the possibility of unlocking unique items that will help you on each match: special ball, stronger defense, customized football cards, and more possession to defeat your opponents.

🏆 Deal soccer cards, play soccer games, win and become a champion. 🏆
In this virtual soccer world, players from all over the world can connect, build friendships, create the best teams and fight together for the same goals. Football Rivals is your daily escape from real life where you can be part of your dream soccer team and fight in your dream league.

✨ Step on the field and try out this multiplayer soccer game! ✨
Your goal is to win trophies and fight for a better place in the National and World Rankings. The adrenaline increases during the LIVE matches played against other Real Players, this is why being ACTIVE, especially during the live match, is an essential part. To win, besides Energy, you’ll also need your teammates. You need to be there for them, no matter what! To draw the winning soccer cards and become champions together by winning your dream league and lots of other tournaments.
One thing is for sure - Teamwork helps you SCORE in Football Rivals!

🌎 An online soccer world in your hands! 🌎
You can connect your social media account to find your friends easily and make new ones! Join the Football Rivals online soccer community on Facebook, Instagram, and TikTok and stay updated with contests, new features, releases, and news!

Football Rivals is free to play, but some items can be purchased for real money.
A network connection is required to play!

For any issues or suggestions regarding the game, contact us at: support.footballrivals@greenhorsegames.com

Deal soccer cards to attack your ultimate rivals! Participate in exciting matches where you will have to prove your team spirit and tactical skills. A soccer game you shouldn't miss out on! Match by match you can improve your strategy to bring fame by your side.

👥 Join your local soccer community 👥

• In World Nations Cup, your Club can take over different National Teams and bring them to glory in the qualifying, groups, and knockout stages;

• Thematic Golden Ball Competitions - with the possibility of unlocking unique items that will help you on each match: special ball, stronger defense, customized football cards, and more possession to defeat your opponents.

🏆 Deal soccer cards, play soccer games, win and become a champion. 🏆

Your goal is to win trophies and fight for a better place in the National and World Rankings. To win, besides Energy, you’ll also need your teammates. You need to be there for them, no matter what! Start your football career

Train your way to the top!
Build your football career by upgrading your level and gain new skills.Level up to increase your strength and JOIN A SOCCER TEAM! Don't forget that training is what your player needs! Score goals and join the team of the soccer stars. ✨ Sports games are a fun way to spend time with friends.

Join the community
Join and stand beside people from your country and support your national soccer teams! Come and play with people who love football games as you do. Score, win every match and be the best football player. Team up with friends in this multiplayer football game to win your league.🔥 Help your national soccer team and support your country!

Deal, attack, defend and help!
If you like football games ⚽ - Football Rivals is just for you. Try it out and join others on your way to become a football champion. 🏅 Deal cards and gain valuable skill, attack your rivals by shooting penalties and looting their skill! Collect gloves to defend against rival attacks, and help your friends and teammates by sending them gifts!

Real challenge with friends!
Join your favorite soccer team or later create your own! Recruit your friends and play against teams with other real players all around the world! Score goals for your team and become its HERO! Join your friends who like football games.

Multiplayer football game you have to try out!

Shine bright like a Trophy!
Play in multiple competitions like the Championship, National Cup, Champions Cup and collect trophies for your Team with your friends! 🏆 Victory is yours for the taking! Become champions with your friends and advance your football career.

An online soccer world in your hands!
Join the Football Rivals online community on Facebook, and stay updated with contests, new features, releases and news! Find new tricks to be a better soccer player. ⚽

Download the app and join millions of soccer players across the world in our unique social multiplayer football game!
Don't stop winning, score goals and you will be part of the soccer stars club.

- Team up with friends in this multiplayer game.
- Score goals and join the team of the soccer stars.
- If you like sports games, join us now.
- Be the best football player and make your soccer team champions.

descriptionHtml:
Join this multiplayer football world, team up with your friends, score goals and create the PERFECT FOOTBALL TEAM!⚽

Start your football career
Deal cards to attack your rivals or help your friends. In this soccer game, you can join your favorite team, win trophies 🏆 with your friends and teammates! This is the sports game for real champions. 🏅

Train your way to the top!
Build your football career by upgrading your level and gain new skills.Level up to increase your strength and JOIN A SOCCER TEAM! Don't forget that training is what your player needs! Score goals and join the team of the soccer stars. ✨ Sports games are a fun way to spend time with friends.

Join the community
Join and stand beside people from your country and support your national soccer teams! Come and play with people who love football games as you do. Score, win every match and be the best football player. Team up with friends in this multiplayer football game to win your league.🔥 Help your national soccer team and support your country!

Deal, attack, defend and help!
If you like football games ⚽ - Football Rivals is just for you. Try it out and join others on your way to become a football champion. 🏅 Deal cards and gain valuable skill, attack your rivals by shooting penalties and looting their skill! Collect gloves to defend against rival attacks, and help your friends and teammates by sending them gifts!

Real challenge with friends!
Join your favorite soccer team or later create your own! Recruit your friends and play against teams with other real players all around the world! Score goals for your team and become its HERO! Join your friends who like football games.

Multiplayer football game you have to try out!

Shine bright like a Trophy!
Play in multiple competitions like the Championship, National Cup, Champions Cup and collect trophies for your Team with your friends! 🏆 Victory is yours for the taking! Become champions with your friends and advance your football career.

An online soccer world in your hands!
Join the Football Rivals online community on Facebook, and stay updated with contests, new features, releases and news! Find new tricks to be a better soccer player. ⚽

Download the app and join millions of soccer players across the world in our unique social multiplayer football game!
Don't stop winning, score goals and you will be part of the soccer stars club.

COME AND PLAY football game
- Team up with friends in this multiplayer game.
- Score goals and join the team of the soccer stars.
- If you like sports games, join us now.
- Be the best football player and make your soccer team champions.
- Start your football career now.

container.value: Aleea Fizicienilor Nr. 21, Bl. 1F, Scara 2, Et. 4, Ap.27  - Bucuresti, Cod postal: 041211

creator: Green Horse Games
descriptionHtml:
Do you want to experience something different from the usual soccer games you play? Football Rivals is just for you.

A multiplayer soccer game that brings sports fans together. Team up with your friends and lead your team to success! Help it to become the ultimate team!

🏅 Start your soccer career 🏅
Millions of players from all over the globe are waiting for you in this social soccer game, where you can meet new friends and join a supportive community.

Deal soccer cards to attack your ultimate rivals! Participate in exciting matches where you will have to prove your team spirit and tactical skills. A soccer game you shouldn't miss out on! Match by match you can improve your strategy to bring fame by your side.

👥 Join your local soccer community 👥
Find and team up with people from your country to support your national soccer team and defeat rival countries!
Lots of friends that love soccer games just like you do are waiting for you. Who knows, maybe those friendships that you will start in Football Rivals can transform into real ones, and you will have new mates to go to real soccer games with!

Main Features
• Join a Team: collaborate, make strategies and play matches with other real people - each match will be a real challenge;
• Team customization - logo, avatars, description, statuses;
• Team Chat: where you can talk to your teammates and prepare the strategies for the upcoming competitions tournaments;
• Matches - participate in each soccer match with your team and score as many goals as you can;
• Use emojis to communicate your thoughts to your rivals;
• Energy to play - attack rivals in a penalty shootout mini-game, help your teammates & friends with gifts, level up, and become the hero of your team;
• Soccer game competitions - participate in competitions like Champions Cup, American League, Continental Cup, National Cup, Super Cup, and World Nations Cup
• In World Nations Cup, your Club can take over different National Teams and bring them to glory in the qualifying, groups, and knockout stages;
• Training Sessions: a 50 players competition where the biggest goal is to increase your level faster;
• Thematic Golden Ball - with the possibility of unlocking unique items that will help you on each match: special ball,
customized football cards, and more possession to defeat your opponents.

🏆 Deal soccer cards, play soccer games, win and become a champion. 🏆
In this virtual soccer world, players from all over the world can connect, build friendships, create the best teams and fight together for the same goals. Football Rivals is your daily escape from real life where you can be part of your dream soccer team and fight in your dream league.

✨ Step on the field and try out this multiplayer soccer game! ✨
Your goal is to win trophies and fight for a better place in the National and World Rankings. The adrenaline increases during the LIVE matches played against other Real Players. To win, besides Energy, you’ll also need your teammates. To draw the winning soccer cards and become champions together by winning your dream league and lots of other tournaments.

🌎 An online soccer world in your hands! 🌎
You can connect your social media account to find your friends easily and make new ones! Join the Football Rivals online soccer community on Facebook, Instagram, and TikTok and stay updated with contests, new features, releases, and news!

Football Rivals is free to play, but some items can be purchased for real money.
A network connection is required to play!

For any issues or suggestions regarding the game, contact us at: support.footballrivals@greenhorsegames.com

Lots of friends that love soccer games just like you do are waiting for you. Who knows, maybe those friendships that you will start in Football Rivals can transform into real ones, and you will have new mates to go to real soccer games with!

Main Features
• Join a Team: collaborate, make strategies and play matches with other real people - each match will be a real challenge;
• Team customization - logo, avatars, description, statuses;
• Team Chat: where you can talk to your teammates and prepare the strategies for the upcoming competitions tournaments;
• Matches - participate in each soccer match with your team and score as many goals as you can;
• Use emojis to communicate your thoughts to your rivals;
• Energy to play - attack rivals in a penalty shootout mini-game, help your teammates & friends with gifts, level up, and become the hero of your team;
• Soccer game competitions - participate in competitions like Champions Cup, American League, Continental Cup, National Cup, Super Cup, and World Nations Cup
• In World Nations Cup, your Club can take over different National Teams and bring them to glory in the qualifying, groups, and knockout stages;
• Training Sessions: a 50 players competition where the biggest goal is to increase your level faster;
• Thematic Golden Ball - with the possibility of unlocking unique items that will help you on each match: special ball,
customized football cards, and more possession to defeat your opponents.

🏆 Deal soccer cards, play soccer games, win and become a champion. 🏆
In this virtual soccer world, players from all over the world can connect, build friendships, create the best teams and fight together for the same goals. Football Rivals is your daily escape from real life where you can be part of your dream soccer team and fight in your dream league.

✨ Step on the field and try out this multiplayer soccer game! ✨
Your goal is to win trophies and fight for a better place in the National and World Rankings. The adrenaline increases during the LIVE matches played against other Real Players. To win, besides Energy, you’ll also need your teammates. To draw the winning soccer cards and become champions together by winning your dream league and lots of other tournaments.

🌎 An online soccer world in your hands! 🌎
You can connect your social media account to find your friends easily and make new ones! Join the Football Rivals online soccer community on Facebook, Instagram, and TikTok and stay updated with contests, new features, releases, and news!

Football Rivals is free to play, but some items can be purchased for real money.
A network connection is required to play!

For any issues or suggestions regarding the game, contact us at: support.footballrivals@greenhorsegames.com

title: Football Rivals: Online Soccer

container.value: Aleea Fizicienilor Nr. 21, Bl. 1F, Scara 2, Et. 4, Ap.27  - Bucuresti, Cod postal: 041211

creator: Green Horse Games
descriptionHtml:
Are you a fan of sports games, particularly when it comes to football games? Is the adrenaline of a football battle on your list of favorites?

In that case, you wouldn’t want to miss our multiplayer sports game - Football Rivals.

If you're a talented team player who can execute perfect passes and score goals with finesse, then it's time to take the field, tackle opponents, and find the back of the net in this mobile football game.
Get the crowds roaring in the football stadium and become a soccer legend!

Build the strongest football team that has ever existed!

Get ready for some football mania with and against other real football fans just like you!
Join a football club, lead it to success, and turn it into the most feared opponent on any football field.
Ensure your team has the best strategy to defeat your next rivals.

Play online multiplayer games with friends

Team up with friends and experience something different from the usual football games you play.
No matter what football team you support, here is the place where you can meet other fans who share the same passion as yours, talk to them, make strategies, and become champions together.

Unleash your football spirit in this ultimate football clash

Spin football cards, gain skills, attack your rivals, score epic goals with your supercard, and win the game!

Even though it's really easy to play, the feeling you get during the live matches is incredible. Being active, especially during the live battles, is an essential part.

Win football competitions and trophies

Play in plenty of competitions: League, Supercup, Champions Cup, Continental Cup, World Nations Cup, National Cup, and win glory and rewards at the end of the road!

Winning the tournaments will give you cups that will be added to your player and team profile so that others can know what you’re capable of.

Remember: win or lose, you must hold your head up.
Get ready for some fantasy football! You can be the next soccer star!

Be the best football player in the world

Climb up the leaderboards and be among the top teams!
Each football clash and trophy won will award you valuable prizes and great rewards.

Main features:

• Join a team: collaborate, make strategies, and play football battles with other real people;
• Spin football cards and get skill/bag of skill, possession, energy, gloves, and last but not least, penalty shootout mini-games;
• Team chat: socialize with your teammates and get pumped for the next big match;
• Football matches - participate with your team in simplified football matches; attack opponents and put the ball in the net, level up and become the hero of your football club;
• Team football captain: each team can have one captain, and that captain can, for good reasons, kick players from the team;
• Football training sessions: a 50 players competition where the biggest goal is to increase your level faster;
• Thematic Golden Ball Competitions - with the possibility of unlocking unique items that will help you on each match.

Join the online community

You can connect your social media account to find your friends easily and make new ones! Join the Football Rivals online community on Facebook, Instagram, and TikTok, and stay updated with contests, new features, releases, and news!

Football Rivals is free to play, but some items can be purchased for real money.
A network connection is required to play!

For any issues or suggestions regarding the game, contact us at: 📩support.footballrivals@greenhorsegames.com

title:
Football Rivals: Soccer Game
1.62.586

container.value: Aleea Fizicienilor Nr. 21, Bl. 1F, Scara 2, Et. 4, Ap.27  - Bucuresti, Cod postal: 041211

creator: Green Horse Games
descriptionHtml:
Do you want to experience something different from the usual football games you play? Football Rivals is just for you.

This is a multiplayer football game that brings football fans together. Team up with your friends and lead your team to success!

Start your football career
Millions of players from all over the globe are waiting for you in this soccer game, where you can meet new friends and join a supportive community.

Deal football cards to attack your rivals and make history with your friends help!! Participate in exciting matches where you will have to prove your team spirit and tactical skills. A football game you shouldn't miss out on!

Join your local football community
Find and team up with people from your country to support your national soccer team! Lots of friends that love soccer games just like you do are waiting for you. Who knows, maybe those friendships that you will start in Football Rivals can transform into real ones, and you will have new mates to go to real soccer games with!

Main Features
• Join a Team: collaborate, make strategies and play matches with other real people;
• Finish the Academies to gain skills;
• Team customization - logo, avatars, description, statuses;
• Team Chat: where you can talk to your teammates and prepare the strategies for the upcoming competitions;
• Matches - participate with your team in simplified football matches against other teams;
• Use emojis to communicate your thoughts to your opponents;
• Energy to play - attack opponents in a penalty shootout mini-game, help your teammates & friends with gifts, level up and become the hero of your team
• Football game competitions - participate in competitions like: Champions Cup, Continental Cup, National Cup, Super Cup, World Nations Cup;
• In World Nations Cup, your team can take over different National Teams and bring them to glory in the qualifying, groups and knockout stages;
• Training Sessions: a 50 players competition where the biggest goal is to increase your level faster;
• Thematic Golden Ball Competitions - with the possibility of unlocking unique items that will help you on each match.

Deal football cards, play matches, win and become a champion.
In this multiplayer football game, players from all over the world can connect, build friendships, create the best teams and fight together for the same goals. Football Rivals is your daily escape from real life where you can be part of your dream football team.

Multiplayer football game you have to try out!
Your goal is to win trophies and fight for a better place in the National and World Rankings. The adrenaline increases during the LIVE matches played against other Real Players. To win, besides Energy, you’ll also need your teammates. You need to be there for them, no matter what! To draw the winning football cards and become champions together. One thing is for sure - Teamwork helps you SCORE in Football Rivals!

An online football world in your hands!
You can connect your social media account to find your friends easily and make new ones! Join the Football Rivals online soccer community on Facebook and Instagram, and stay updated with contests, new features, releases, and news!

Football Rivals is free to play, but some items can be purchased for real money.
A network connection is required to play!

For any issues or suggestions regarding the game, contact us at: support.footballrivals@greenhorsegames.com
descriptionShort: Team-up with friends online to play soccer and win online football matches!

Unleash your football spirit in this ultimate football clash

Win football competitions and trophies

Be the best football player in the world

• Join a team: collaborate, make strategies, and play football battles with other real people;

title:
Football Rivals: Online Game
1.68.740

container.value: Aleea Fizicienilor Nr. 21, Bl. 1F, Scara 2, Et. 4, Ap.27  - Bucuresti, Cod postal: 041211

creator: Green Horse Games
descriptionHtml:
Do you want to experience something different from the usual soccer games you play? Football Rivals is just for you.

A multiplayer soccer game that brings sports fans together. Team up with your friends and lead your team to success! Help it to become the ultimate team!

🏅 Start your soccer career 🏅
Millions of players from all over the globe are waiting for you in this social soccer game, where you can meet new friends and join a supportive community.

Deal soccer cards to attack your ultimate rivals! Participate in exciting matches where you will have to prove your team spirit and tactical skills. A soccer game you shouldn't miss out on! Match by match you can improve your strategy to bring fame by your side.

👥 Join your local soccer community 👥
Find and team up with people from your country to support your national soccer team and defeat rival countries!
Lots of friends that love soccer games just like you do are waiting for you. Who knows, maybe those friendships that you will start in Football Rivals can transform into real ones, and you will have new mates to go to real soccer games with!

Main Features
• Join a Team: collaborate, make strategies and play matches with other real people - each match will be a real challenge;
• Team customization - logo, avatars, description, statuses;
• Team Chat: where you can talk to your teammates and prepare the strategies for the upcoming competitions tournaments;
• Matches - participate in each soccer match with your team and score as many goals as you can;
• Use emojis to communicate your thoughts to your rivals;
• Energy to play - attack rivals in a penalty shootout mini-game, help your teammates & friends with gifts, level up, and become the hero of your team;
• Soccer game competitions - participate in competitions like Champions Cup, American League, Continental Cup, National Cup, Super Cup, and World Nations Cup
• In World Nations Cup, your Club can take over different National Teams and bring them to glory in the qualifying, groups, and knockout stages;
• Training Sessions: a 50 players competition where the biggest goal is to increase your level faster;
• Thematic Golden Ball - with the possibility of unlocking unique items that will help you on each match: special ball,
customized football cards, and more possession to defeat your opponents.

🏆 Deal soccer cards, play soccer games, win and become a champion. 🏆
In this virtual soccer world, players from all over the world can connect, build friendships, create the best teams and fight together for the same goals. Football Rivals is your daily escape from real life where you can be part of your dream soccer team and fight in your dream league.

✨ Step on the field and try out this multiplayer soccer game! ✨
Your goal is to win trophies and fight for a better place in the National and World Rankings. The adrenaline increases during the LIVE matches played against other Real Players. To win, besides Energy, you’ll also need your teammates. To draw the winning soccer cards and become champions together by winning your dream league and lots of other tournaments.

🌎 An online soccer world in your hands! 🌎
You can connect your social media account to find your friends easily and make new ones! Join the Football Rivals online soccer community on Facebook, Instagram, and TikTok and stay updated with contests, new features, releases, and news!

Football Rivals is free to play, but some items can be purchased for real money.
A network connection is required to play!

For any issues or suggestions regarding the game, contact us at: support.footballrivals@greenhorsegames.com

container.value: Aleea Fizicienilor Nr. 21, Bl. 1F, Scara 2, Et. 4, Ap.27  - Bucuresti, Cod postal: 041211

creator: Green Horse Games
descriptionHtml:
Are you a fan of sports games, particularly when it comes to football games? Is the adrenaline of a football battle on your list of favorites?

In that case, you wouldn’t want to miss our multiplayer sports game - Football Rivals.

If you're a talented team player who can execute perfect passes and score goals with finesse, then it's time to take the field, tackle opponents, and find the back of the net in this mobile football game.
Get the crowds roaring in the football stadium and become a soccer legend!

Build the strongest football team that has ever existed!

Get ready for some football mania with and against other real football fans just like you!
Join a football club, lead it to success, and turn it into the most feared opponent on any football field.
Ensure your team has the best strategy to defeat your next rivals.

Play online multiplayer games with friends

Team up with friends and experience something different from the usual football games you play.
No matter what football team you support, here is the place where you can meet other fans who share the same passion as yours, talk to them, make strategies, and become champions together.

Unleash your football spirit in this ultimate football clash

Spin football cards, gain skills, attack your rivals, score epic goals with your supercard, and win the game!

Even though it's really easy to play, the feeling you get during the live matches is incredible. Being active, especially during the live battles, is an essential part.

Win football competitions and trophies

Play in plenty of competitions: League, Supercup, Champions Cup, Continental Cup, World Nations Cup, National Cup, and win glory and rewards at the end of the road!

Winning the tournaments will give you cups that will be added to your player and team profile so that others can know what you’re capable of.

Remember: win or lose, you must hold your head up.
Get ready for some fantasy football! You can be the next soccer star!

Be the best football player in the world

Climb up the leaderboards and be among the top teams!
Each football clash and trophy won will award you valuable prizes and great rewards.

Main features:

• Join a team: collaborate, make strategies, and play football battles with other real people;
• Spin football cards and get skill/bag of skill, possession, energy, gloves, and last but not least, penalty shootout mini-games;
• Team chat: socialize with your teammates and get pumped for the next big match;
• Football matches - participate with your team in simplified football matches; attack opponents and put the ball in the net, level up and become the hero of your football club;
• Team football captain: each team can have one captain, and that captain can, for good reasons, kick players from the team;
• Football training sessions: a 50 players competition where the biggest goal is to increase your level faster;
• Thematic Golden Ball Competitions - with the possibility of unlocking unique items that will help you on each match.

Join the online community

You can connect your social media account to find your friends easily and make new ones! Join the Football Rivals online community on Facebook, Instagram, and TikTok, and stay updated with contests, new features, releases, and news!

Football Rivals is free to play, but some items can be purchased for real money.
A network connection is required to play!

For any issues or suggestions regarding the game, contact us at: 📩support.footballrivals@greenhorsegames.com !
descriptionShort: Multiplayer sports game! Team up with friends and start your football career!

creator: Green Horse Games
descriptionHtml:
Are you a fan of sports games, particularly when it comes to football games? Is the adrenaline of a football battle on your list of favorites?

In that case, you wouldn’t want to miss our multiplayer sports game - Football Rivals.

If you're a talented team player who can execute perfect passes and score goals with finesse, then it's time to take the field, tackle opponents, and find the back of the net in this mobile football game.
Get the crowds roaring in the football stadium and become a soccer legend!

Build the strongest football team that has ever existed!

Get ready for some football mania with and against other real football fans just like you!
Join a football club, lead it to success, and turn it into the most feared opponent on any football field.
Ensure your team has the best strategy to defeat your next rivals.

Play online multiplayer games with friends

Team up with friends and experience something different from the usual football games you play.
No matter what football team you support, here is the place where you can meet other fans who share the same passion as yours, talk to them, make strategies, and become champions together.

Unleash your football spirit in this ultimate football clash

Spin football cards, gain skills, attack your rivals, score epic goals with your supercard, and win the game!

Even though it's really easy to play, the feeling you get during the live matches is incredible. Being active, especially during the live battles, is an essential part.

Win football competitions and trophies

Play in plenty of competitions: League, Supercup, Champions Cup, Continental Cup, World Nations Cup, National Cup, and win glory and rewards at the end of the road!

Winning the tournaments will give you cups that will be added to your player and team profile so that others can know what you’re capable of.

Remember: win or lose, you must hold your head up.
Get ready for some fantasy football! You can be the next soccer star!

Be the best football player in the world

Climb up the leaderboards and be among the top teams!
Each football clash and trophy won will award you valuable prizes and great rewards.

Main features:

• Join a team: collaborate, make strategies, and play football battles with other real people;
• Spin football cards and get skill/bag of skill, possession, energy, gloves, and last but not least, penalty shootout mini-games;
• Team chat: socialize with your teammates and get pumped for the next big match;
• Football matches - participate with your team in simplified football matches; attack opponents and put the ball in the net, level up and become the hero of your football club;
• Team football captain: each team can have one captain, and that captain can, for good reasons, kick players from the team;
• Football training sessions: a 50 players competition where the biggest goal is to increase your level faster;
• Thematic Golden Ball Competitions - with the possibility of unlocking unique items that will help you on each match.

Join the online community

You can connect your social media account to find your friends easily and make new ones! Join the Football Rivals online community on Facebook, Instagram, and TikTok, and stay updated with contests, new features, releases, and news!

Football Rivals is free to play, but some items can be purchased for real money.
A network connection is required to play!

For any issues or suggestions regarding the game, contact us at: 📩support.footballrivals@greenhorsegames.com !

creator: Green Horse Games
descriptionHtml:
This winter, Football Rivals becomes a global holiday celebration. Embrace the winter season with thrilling live matches on the icy field, exciting challenges, and magical gifts waiting for you. It’s the ultimate mix of football strategy, teamwork, and holiday fun that will keep you engaged all season long.

Are you a fan of sports games, particularly when it comes to football games? Is the adrenaline of a football battle on your list of favorites?

In that case, you wouldn’t want to miss our multiplayer sports game - Football Rivals.

If you're a talented team player who can execute perfect passes and score goals with finesse, then it's time to take the field, tackle opponents, and find the back of the net in this mobile football game.
Get the crowds roaring in the football stadium and become a soccer legend!

Build the strongest football team that has ever existed!

Get ready for some football mania with and against other real football fans just like you!
Join a football club, lead it to success, and turn it into the most feared opponent on any football field.
Ensure your team has the best strategy to defeat your next rivals.

Play online multiplayer games with friends

Team up with friends and experience something different from the usual football games you play.
No matter what football team you support, here is the place where you can meet other fans who share the same passion as yours, talk to them, make strategies, and become champions together.

Unleash your football spirit in this ultimate football clash

Spin football cards, gain skills, attack your rivals, score epic goals with your supercard, and win the game!

Even though it's really easy to play, the feeling you get during the live matches is incredible. Being active, especially during the live battles, is an essential part.

Win football competitions and trophies

Play in plenty of competitions: League, Supercup, Champions Cup, Continental Cup, World Nations Cup, National Cup, and win glory and rewards at the end of the road!

Winning the tournaments will give you cups that will be added to your player and team profile so that others can know what you’re capable of.

Remember: win or lose, you must hold your head up.
Get ready for some fantasy football! You can be the next soccer star!

Be the best football player in the world

Climb up the leaderboards and be among the top teams!
Each football clash and trophy won will award you valuable prizes and great rewards.

Main features:

• Join a team: collaborate, make strategies, and play football battles with other real people;
• Spin football cards and get skill/bag of skill, possession, energy, gloves, and last but not least, penalty shootout mini-games;
• Team chat: socialize with your teammates and get pumped for the next big match;
• Football matches - participate with your team in simplified football matches; attack opponents and put the ball in the net, level up and become the hero of your football club;
• Team football captain: each team can have one captain, and that captain can, for good reasons, kick players from the team;
• Football training sessions: a 50 players competition where the biggest goal is to increase your level faster;
• Thematic Golden Ball Competitions - with the possibility of unlocking unique items that will help you on each match.

Join the online community

You can connect your social media account to find your friends easily and make new ones! Join the Football Rivals online community on Facebook, Instagram, and TikTok, and stay updated with contests, new features, releases, and news!

Football Rivals is free to play, but some items can be purchased for real money.
A network connection is required to play!

For any issues or suggestions regarding the game, contact us at: 📩support.footballrivals@greenhorsegames.com !

Spin football cards, gain skills, attack your rivals, score epic goals with your supercard, and win the game!

Even though it's really easy to play, the feeling you get during the live matches is incredible. Being active, especially during the live battles, is an essential part.

Win football competitions and trophies

Play in plenty of competitions: League, Supercup, Champions Cup, Continental Cup, World Nations Cup, National Cup, and win glory and rewards at the end of the road!

Winning the tournaments will give you cups that will be added to your player and team profile so that others can know what you’re capable of.

Remember: win or lose, you must hold your head up.
Get ready for some fantasy football! You can be the next soccer star!

Be the best football player in the world

Climb up the leaderboards and be among the top teams!
Each football clash and trophy won will award you valuable prizes and great rewards.

Main features:

• Join a team: collaborate, make strategies, and play football battles with other real people;
• Spin football cards and get skill/bag of skill, possession, energy, gloves, and last but not least, penalty shootout mini-games;
• Team chat: socialize with your teammates and get pumped for the next big match;
• Football matches - participate with your team in simplified football matches; attack opponents and put the ball in the net, level up and become the hero of your football club;
• Team football captain: each team can have one captain, and that captain can, for good reasons, kick players from the team;
• Football training sessions: a 50 players competition where the biggest goal is to increase your level faster;
• Thematic Golden Ball Competitions - with the possibility of unlocking unique items that will help you on each match.

Join the online community

You can connect your social media account to find your friends easily and make new ones! Join the Football Rivals online community on Facebook, Instagram, and TikTok, and stay updated with contests, new features, releases, and news!

Football Rivals is free to play, but some items can be purchased for real money.
A network connection is required to play!

For any issues or suggestions regarding the game, contact us at: 📩support.footballrivals@greenhorsegames.com !
